impact.primary: Reduced intake-to-handoff time by 80-90% (from 3-5 minutes to 15-30 seconds)
metrics: Cut manual fields per intake by 70% (from 8-12 to 2-3)
Automatic task creation at key milestones
Auto-duplication of awarded projects with owner carryover

overview.problem: Project intake, assignment, and milestone tracking required repetitive manual edits and copy-paste across multiple pages, leading to inconsistent data and missed follow-ups.
overview.solution: Built from scratch a custom Notion PM system with status-driven automations: intake triage, PM assignment, auto-date stamping on milestones, auto-creation of tasks and checkpoint records, and one-click duplication of awarded retrofit leads into the Projects DB.
overview.outcome: Faster handoffs, standardized schema for reporting, and reliable accountability via automatic notifications and timeline-based visibility. Now managing 40+ projects seamlessly.

impact.primary: Saved 200+ hours annually by automating data sync between systems
metrics: Automatically finds and updates projects missing MCX Site IDs
Unified portfolio dashboards for centralized visibility

overview.problem: Disconnected data across MeterConnex and Notion caused fragmentation, manual lookups, and duplicated updates across systems.
overview.solution: Built complete API integration: designed system architecture for syncing MCX data into Notion, then implemented Python scripts scheduled weekly to scan, update, and maintain data consistency across 189+ projects.
overview.outcome: Eliminated hours of weekly manual data entry, consistent cross-system data quality, and real-time portfolio dashboards powered by automated synchronization.

impact.primary: Reduced daily reconciliation from 2.5 hours to 14 seconds (300+ hours saved annually)
metrics: Generates audit-ready batch files with run logs

overview.problem: Finance teams manually split transactions by bank, reconcile control reports to bank statements, and prepare Cogsdale batch files â€” a long, error-prone process taking 2.5 hours daily.
overview.solution: Python engine that ingests raw transactions, reconciles totals with control reports and bank statements, and outputs per-bank batch files aligned to Cogsdale requirements with full run summaries and logging.
overview.outcome: Orders-of-magnitude faster processing (14 seconds vs 2.5 hours) with documented, repeatable reconciliation. Runs daily Mon-Fri, saving 300+ hours annually.

impact.primary: Proactively flags data availability and communication issues across 5 meter groups (currently piloting)
metrics: Categorizes results into events, rechecks, flags, and actions
Scheduled checks per meter group with automated rechecks
Reduces billing errors and reactive service calls

overview.problem: Missing or late meter data creates downstream billing errors and reactive service tickets; no systematic, proactive anomaly detection existed.
overview.solution: Built a Python-based MDMS service with APIs and scheduled checks that flag anomalies by rule set, rechecks to confirm issues, and routes outcomes to teams for action.
overview.outcome: Clear path from POC to pilot with defined environment, schedule, and reporting surfaces; positions operations to catch issues before billing cycles. Pilot currently underway.

overview.problem: Managing 40+ sub-metering projects with no centralized system. Information buried in spreadsheets, duplicated contacts, missed follow-ups.
overview.solution: 2 years ago, evaluated PM tools and chose Notion for its building blocks approach. Started small with tasks and projects, gradually added meeting notes, contacts, automations, and custom workflows tailored to our unique processes.
overview.outcome: From personal productivity tool to company standard. Information readily accessible with one click instead of digging through spreadsheets. Foundation for all subsequent automation projects.
